pronunciation: SUB'TIL, [Latin subtilis. This word is often written subtle, but less properly.]

definitions.text:
1. Thin; not dense gross; as air; vapor; medium.
2. Nice; fine; delicate.I do distinguish plainEach line her immortal face.
3. Acute; piercing; as pain.
4. Sly; artful; cunning; crafty; insinuating; as person; adversary.
5. Planned by art; deceitful; as scheme.
6. Deceitful; treacherous.
7. Refined; fine; acute; as argument.
